name: Kangra
description: Kangra is one of the most picturesque districts of Himachal Pradesh, known for its ancient temples, tea gardens, and the majestic Dhauladhar range. The district is home to the famous Kangra Fort and numerous Buddhist monasteries.
summary: A blend of ancient heritage and natural beauty

locations.name: Kangra Fort
locations.description: One of the oldest forts in India, offering panoramic views of the Kangra Valley.
locations.address: Kangra Fort Road, Kangra, Himachal Pradesh

locations.name: McLeod Ganj
locations.description: Home to the Dalai Lama and a vibrant Tibetan community, known for its monasteries and cafes.

locations.name: Triund Trek
locations.description: Popular trekking destination offering stunning views of the Dhauladhar range.
locations.hours: Best time: March to June, September to November

locations.name: Baijnath Temple
locations.description: Ancient Shiva temple known for its architectural beauty and religious significance.
